column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=In the late 1980s , you retired from music completely .
#Text=Was this a difficult decision for you to make ?
#Text=What things did you want out of your life which required you to leave music ?
#Text=Where did you go , and what did you do in retirement ?
#Text=Nothing is ever difficult when we accept to assume our choice .
#Text=Those years were very disco , we were entering terrains I was n't ready to tread , and I had been spoiled by my artist 's life by going ever farther and farther from home .
#Text=The French media ignored me after my victory for Luxembourg .
#Text=Everyone wanted a second " Tu te reconnaîtras " and that is impossible .
#Text=And so I went where the public awaited me , by changing countries nearly daily , and this tired me .
#Text=I told myself that my life was not made only of songs and glory , and that I was passionate [ about ] many other things .
#Text=I would have had to sacrifice far too many things and people to recover a place in France , like going to live in France , living a life of popularity , etc ...
#Text=I told myself that I had already been spoiled , so I said stop !
#Text=in 1987 after the [ Song ] Festival in Chile .

#Text=I participated in [ many ] great projects [ revolving ] around the Lusitanian horses and the fighting bulls which I raised with passion and love , but [ my ] life [ eventually ] did not follow those paths ... maybe because my life is the stage and life took charge [ and reminded ] me of that ...
#Text=Return to music
#Text=You came out of retirement five years ago .
#Text=How often did you think about returning to music while in retirement ?
#Text=Was music something you felt you could n't just " let go " ?
#Text=When I decide to do something , I do it .
#Text=When I decide to stop something , I do that too .
#Text=But that is n't taking into account that there are things which we want to do , and those which life decides for us !

#Text=In 1987 , I vowed never to return to the stage , but as I said , life sometimes serves you dishes that you did n't choose , and in 2003 it 's chance that made me return to the stage , and it 's my fans whom I never imagined [ I had ] in such numbers and whom , so many years later , had conserved their love , which made me stay .
#Text=I owe them a lot and will never forget that .
#Text=Tell us about the CDs you have released since coming out of retirement .
#Text=Are you experimenting with any new musical styles ?
#Text=I read you had a lot of input into your CD " Federico " ; describe the direction you wanted to pursue with that disc .
#Text=It 's thanks to the fans from my fan club that I could create a live CD , which I titled " Live à Charleroi " ( Live at Charleroi ) .
#Text=They sent me money via my fan club to allow me to be at the concert , and they bought my CD in advance even before it existed .
#Text=[ All of this was ] just to help me , just to show me how much they wanted to find me [ on stage ] again [ for that moment ] , in the space of 14 songs with a simple piano .
